data.name: Radiolight
data.detailed_description:
Radiolight is a riveting thriller about strange happenings in the town of Ashwood Creek. Play as Daniel, an ex-police officer, who has to fight the supernatural and himself when his family's and friends' lives are on the line.

Key Features:

  • This one-man passion project is a gripping journey shaped by YOUR actions
  • An atmospheric thriller set in a small town in the 1980s
  • Communicate through a walkie-talkie
  • Piece together the mystery through exploration and interaction

Radiolight is a riveting thriller about strange happenings in the town of Ashwood Creek. Play as Daniel, an ex-police officer, who has to fight the supernatural and himself when his family's and friends' lives are on the line.

data.short_description: Radiolight is a first-person thriller set in a small town in the 1980s, where all you have is a walkie-talkie and your police experience to face the supernatural and save your loved ones.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Czech
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
